channel.title: Why are my Prometheus/Grafana metrics not working after I upgrade my node to 1.1.0?
channel.description:
The Radix node metrics endpoint in version 1.1.0 has changed from `/metrics` to `/prometheus/metrics`
**Prometheus** You will need to update your Prometheus `metrics_path` in your `/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml` for the job that scrapes the Radix node metrics.
**nginx** If you are using an Nginx reverse proxy on your node, ensure that the location in `/etc/nginx/conf.d/metrics-conf.conf` has been changed from `/metrics` to `/prometheus/metrics`
